items.title: Colts talking multi-year deals with Daniel Jones, Alec Pierce
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – There’s one time-tested axiom in the NFL: Deadlines spur action. The NFL Scouting Combine’s annual visit to town is a precursor to the opening of the veteran free agent market in mid-March. That means teams with coveted free-agents-to-be have initiated negotiations to keep those players from reaching the open market. And that includes [...]

items.title: Colts’ 2026 lookahead: Running back

In what has become a disturbing trend, the Indianapolis Colts failed to achieve collective success despite his individual brilliance. Overall, they closed last season on a seven-game losing streak for just the third time in franchise history and missed the playoffs for a fifth consecutive season, [...]

items.title: Colts have ’tag’ option in dealing with Daniel Jones, Alec Pierce
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – The NFL has entered its “tag’’ season. Will the Indianapolis Colts play? Maybe. The franchise/transition tags are two of the restrictive/lucrative mechanisms possessed by teams as part of the Collective Bargaining Agreement. Depending on the level of the tag, it either keeps a pending free agent off the open market entirely or compensates [...]

CBS Sports was first to report the move. He fills the vacancy created when Charlie [...]

A school-record nine Hoosiers have been invited to the NFL’s preeminent player evaluation, which converges on Lucas Oil Stadium Feb. 25. Atop the list is Heisman Trophy-winning quarterback Fernando Mendoza, the presumptive favorite to be selected [...]

items.summary: (WXIN/WTTV) — Beginning in March, items from Jim Irsay's world-renowned collection of memorabilia will be available for purchase at Christie's in New York. Hundreds of objects from The Jim Irsay Collection, representing various milestones in the worlds of sports, music, movies and pop culture, will be available via online auction from March 3-17. The public [...]

Whatever awaits the Indianapolis Colts as they transition from another unsatisfactory 2025 to 2026 hinges on Daniel Jones’ right Achilles. That’s the one he ruptured late in the first quarter of their Dec. 7 game at Jacksonville. A season teeming with promise essentially ended [...]

Arguably the greatest kicker in NFL history was named to the Class of 2026, which was announced Thursday night. “To have this honor is incredible,” Vinatieri told FOX59/CBS4 [...]

items.title: Colts cheerleader chosen for Pro Bowl
items.summary: The Pro Bowl isn't just for NFL players--cheerleaders make the cut, too. Indianapolis Colts cheerleader Cierra is among the NFL's best. She's a five-year member of the team and two-time captain. She'll join cheerleaders from around the NFL at the upcoming Pro Bowl Games. She joined FOX59 Morning News to talk about the honor.

The team announced it had interviewed Rivers, 44, on Friday. His decision apparently was [...]

items.summary: Leonard appeared in five games (one start) as a rookie, completing 39 passes for 415 yards and two touchdowns. He also had six carries for 27 yards and two touchdowns.
